name: 3D Car Game: Parking Jam
description:
The most addictive parking puzzle game of 2022 to train your strategic thinking while relaxing!

This Parking Jam 3D game is more than just a classic puzzle board game - it's more stylized and realistic. Overcrowded parking lot, disorderly obstacles, policemen walking around, etc., pose a big traffic jam challenge. To unblock the parking jam, you need to strategically arrange your moves and drive all the vehicles out of the parking area in the correct order.

During peak hours, traffic comes to a standstill. The parking lot is cluttered with many cars that can't get out. Use your intelligence, move the vehicles vertically or horizontally, and carefully lead them through barriers and onto the road without hitting anything or anybody, especially the Policeman! Or just enjoy the thrill of colliding with other cars or obstacles. After all, in this parking jam 3D puzzle game, you don't have to pay for repairs.

Challenge yourself in thousands of parking jams, earn rewards and unlock fancy car skins, various environments, and cool engine effects. Make sure all cars exit the messy parking lot smoothly. Watch out for Mr. Police, don't bump into him! Angry Cop can flip your car over with one hand! So always keep alert and be patient!

As a fun and addictive puzzle game, this parking jam 3D game is so easy to get started, with exquisite 3D animations and smooth game interaction. The levels will get harder as you solve more parking jams. In the process of driving all the vehicles out of the parking jams one by one, your critical thinking, logical skills, and strategic mindset will also be exercised and improved.

* HIGHLIGHTS OF THIS PARKING JAM 3D

- FREE to play, no stress to enjoy parking traffic jam 3D puzzle game
- CHALLENGE over 10,000 parking jam levels, and more to come
- BOSS LEVEL, unblock heavy traffic jams, more cars and more challenges
- CUSTOM CAR, unlock luxury cars and fill up your garage
- SIMPLE but addictive gameplay, swipe to move cars in a horizontal or vertical direction
- COLORFUL scenes, decorate your parking lot with global characteristic street view
- EASY & HARD, parking jams of various difficulty levels for you to solve
- IMMERSIVE gaming experience, you are the person in charge of this parking lot
- NO TIMER, just unblock cars and relax in this puzzle game
- OFFLINE game, enjoy parking jam games anytime & anywhere
- RESTART at any time until you clear all vehicles from parking jams
- ALL AGES, a parking jam 3D puzzle game for everyone in your family

* HOW TO BECOME A PARKING JAM MASTER

- Move all vehicles out of the tight parking lot in the correct sequence.
- Cars can only drive horizontally or vertically in the parking lot.
- Picking the right car every time is the key to solving traffic jams.
- Pay attention to the small obstacles that are easily overlooked in parking jams.
- Don't mess with Mr. Policeman when you take the car out of the parking lot!

Don't be overwhelmed by rush hour parking jams! Drive all cars to exit parking jams without problems is just what you need to do. This parking traffic jam 3D game is a casual puzzle game that helps you relieve stress, train your brain and enrich your spare time!

DOWNLOAD this parking simulation game now and become a Parking Puzzle Master!
